title: [Neutral]  eBay does not respond to Do Not Track signals

tosdr.case: [Neutral]  eBay does not respond to Do Not Track signals-neutral-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Neutral]  eBay does not respond to Do Not Track signals, but provides a notice for their use of Cookies (http://pages.ebay.com/help/account/cookies-web-beacons.html)
